languages.text: "Братство {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g} //заинтересовано//считает эффективным// сотрудничество с Вольными Торговцами. Согласно {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Марсианскому{/g} договору оно готово оказывать услуги обслуживания династии фон Валанциус. Приоритет задач обслуживания может быть повышен в случае укрепления дипломатических связей".

traits.locale_text: "Флот заинтересован в любых видах священной технологии. Даже безнадежно поврежденные экземпляры помогут сохранить божественную искру Омниссии. Вдобавок мы готовы принять экземпляры технологий и быта нечеловеческого происхождения, ибо постижение еретеха есть благо для тех, кто охраняет Человечество".

languages.text: "The priesthood of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} //is interested in//considers expeditious// cooperation with Rogue Traders. Under the terms of the Treaty of {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, it is willing to provide services to the von Valancius dynasty. The priority of service tasks can be raised if diplomatic links are strengthened."
languages.original_text: "Братство {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g} //заинтересовано//считает эффективным// сотрудничество с Вольными Торговцами. Согласно {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Марсианскому{/g} договору оно готово оказывать услуги обслуживания династии фон Валанциус. Приоритет задач обслуживания может быть повышен в случае укрепления дипломатических связей".

traits.locale_text: "The brotherhood of the Adeptus Mechanicus is interested in/considers expeditious cooperation with Rogue Traders. Under the terms of the Treaty of Mars, it is willing to provide services to the von Valancius dynasty. The priority of service tasks can be raised if diplomatic links are strengthened."

"The Fleet is interested in all types of sacred technology. Even samples that are damaged beyond all hope can help us preserve the Omnissiah's divine spark. We are also willing to accept samples of technology and domestic implements of inhuman origin, for comprehension of tech-heresy is a boon to those who guard humanity."

"The brotherhood of the Adeptus Mechanicus is interested in/considers expeditious cooperation with Rogue Traders. Under the terms of the Treaty of Mars, it is willing to provide services to the von Valancius dynasty. The priority of service tasks can be raised if diplomatic links are strengthened."

"The Fleet is interested in all types of sacred technology. Even samples that are damaged beyond all hope can help us preserve the Omnissiah's divine spark. We are also willing to accept samples of technology and domestic implements of inhuman origin, for comprehension of tech-heresy is a boon to those who guard Humanity."

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}の盟約は自由開拓者との協力関係に//関心を抱いて//迅速な対応を望んで//います。{g|Encyclopedia:Mars}火星{/g}条約に基づき、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝への奉仕を喜んで提供いたします。外交関係が強化されれば、奉仕タスクの優先度を上げることも可能です」
languages.original_text: "The priesthood of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} //is interested in//considers expeditious// cooperation with Rogue Traders. Under the terms of the Treaty of {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, it is willing to provide services to the von Valancius dynasty. The priority of service tasks can be raised if diplomatic links are strengthened."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}の盟約は自由開拓者との協力関係に//関心を抱いて//迅速な対応を望んで//います。{g|Encyclopedia:Mars}火星{/g}条約に基づき、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝への奉仕を喜んで提供いたします。外交関係が強化されれば、奉仕タスクの優先度を上げることも可能です」

languages.text: “{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}//有意//即刻考虑//与行商浪人合作。根据{g|Encyclopedia:Mars}火星{/g}条约的相关条款，机械修会愿意为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝提供服务。如果外交联系加强，可以提升服务任务的优先级。”
languages.original_text: "The priesthood of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} //is interested in//considers expeditious// cooperation with Rogue Traders. Under the terms of the Treaty of {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, it is willing to provide services to the von Valancius dynasty. The priority of service tasks can be raised if diplomatic links are strengthened."

traits.locale_text: “{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}兄弟会//有意//即刻考虑//与行商浪人合作。根据{g|Encyclopedia:Mars}火星{/g}条约的相关条款，机械修会愿意为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝提供服务。如果外交联系加强，可以提升服务任务的优先级。”

languages.text: «El sacerdocio del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} //está interesada en//considera menester// la cooperación con los Comerciantes Independientes. De acuerdo con las condiciones del Tratado de {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Marte{/g}, está dispuesta a prestar servicios a la dinastía von Valancius. La prioridad de las tareas de servicio puede incrementarse si se fomentan las relaciones diplomáticas».
languages.original_text: "The priesthood of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} //is interested in//considers expeditious// cooperation with Rogue Traders. Under the terms of the Treaty of {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, it is willing to provide services to the von Valancius dynasty. The priority of service tasks can be raised if diplomatic links are strengthened."

traits.locale_text: «La hermandad del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} //está interesada en//considera menester// la cooperación con los Comerciantes Independientes. De acuerdo con las condiciones del Tratado de {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Marte{/g}, está dispuesta a prestar servicios a la dinastía von Valancius. La prioridad de las tareas de servicio puede incrementarse si se fomentan las relaciones diplomáticas».

languages.text: « Le clergé de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} //est intéressé par//trouve un peu hâtive// cette coopération avec les libres-marchands. Conformément aux directives du traité de {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, il est disposé à fournir ses services à la dynastie von Valancius. Les tâches demandées pourront être traitées de façon plus prioritaire si les liens diplomatiques sont renforcés. »
languages.original_text: "The priesthood of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} //is interested in//considers expeditious// cooperation with Rogue Traders. Under the terms of the Treaty of {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, it is willing to provide services to the von Valancius dynasty. The priority of service tasks can be raised if diplomatic links are strengthened."

traits.locale_text: « La fraternité de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} //est intéressée par//trouve un peu hâtive// cette coopération avec les libres-marchands. Conformément aux directives du traité de {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, elle est disposée à fournir ses services à la dynastie von Valancius. Les tâches demandées pourront être traitées de façon plus prioritaire si les liens diplomatiques sont renforcés. »

languages.text: "Die Priesterschaft des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} //ist interessiert an einer//erwägt eine rasche// Zusammenarbeit mit Freihändlern. Im Rahmen der Vorgaben des {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}-Vertrags stellt sie der Dynastie von Valancius Dienstleistungen zur Verfügung. Die Priorität von Dienstleistungen kann bei stärkeren diplomatischen Beziehungen erhöht werden."
languages.original_text: "The priesthood of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} //is interested in//considers expeditious// cooperation with Rogue Traders. Under the terms of the Treaty of {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, it is willing to provide services to the von Valancius dynasty. The priority of service tasks can be raised if diplomatic links are strengthened."

traits.locale_text: "Die Bruderschaft des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} //ist interessiert an einer//erwägt eine rasche// Zusammenarbeit mit Freihändlern. Im Rahmen der Vorgaben des {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}-Vertrags stellt sie der Dynastie von Valancius Dienstleistungen zur Verfügung. Die Priorität von Dienstleistungen kann bei stärkeren diplomatischen Beziehungen erhöht werden."

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} Rahipliği, Hür Tacirlerle iş birliğine //ilgiyle bakar//yararlı görür//. {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g} Anlaşması koşulları altında von Valancius hanedanlığına hizmet sağlamaya hazırlar. Diplomatik ilişkiler güçlenirse hizmetlerin öncelik sırası yukarı taşınabilir."
languages.original_text: "The priesthood of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} //is interested in//considers expeditious// cooperation with Rogue Traders. Under the terms of the Treaty of {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, it is willing to provide services to the von Valancius dynasty. The priority of service tasks can be raised if diplomatic links are strengthened."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} Rahipliği, Hür Tacirlerle iş birliği yapmaya //ilgiyle yaklaşıyor//sabırsızlanıyor//. {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g} Anlaşması'nın koşulları altında von Valancius hanedanlığına hizmet sağlamaya hazır. Diplomatik ilişkiler güçlenirse hizmetlerin öncelik sırası yukarı taşınabilir."
